<js>
var bookid = baseUrl.match(/novel\/(\d+)/)[1];

//ä¹¦è¯„å‘é€
const bookva = book.getVariable("custom");

if (bookva != false && bookva !== "" && source.getLoginHeader()) {
    const commenturl = `${GetUL()}/home/comment/add.html`;
    let body = `content=${bookva}&type=novel&mid=${bookid}`
  try {
    let code = String(java.getVerificationCode(`data:image/svg+xml;base64,${codesvg}`));
    if (code == "è¯„è®º" || /^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
//java.log(code);
if (/^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
	   let contid = code.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
    body += `&pid=${contid}`
}
//java.log(body);
    let headers = {
        "x-requested-with": "XMLHttpRequest"
    }
    let ok = java.post(commenturl, body, headers).body();
    java.toast(JSON.parse(ok).msg);
    book.putCustomVariable("");
     } else {
     	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(40);
     	java.toast('è¯·æŒ‰å›¾ç‰‡è¦æ±‚å¡«å†™');

    	}
  } else if(bookva != false && bookva !== "" && !source.getLoginHeader()) {
	java.toast("æœªç™»å½•ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•åæ“ä½œ");
	book.putCustomVariable("");
}

try{
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['ä¹¦ç±ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = /^https?/.test($('[property$=image]@content')) ? $('[property$=image]@content') : GetUL() + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {

                "img": img,

                "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
                "info": $('[property$=description]@content'),

            }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {

src;
